name: cli-microsoft365-mcp-server
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for CLI for Microsoft 365 that allows to use natural language to manage your Microsoft 365 tenant.

tools.name: m365GetCommands
tools.description: Gets all CLI for Microsoft 365 commands to be used by the Model Context Protocol to pick the right command for a given task

tools.name: m365GetCommandDocs
tools.description: Gets documentation for a specified CLI for Microsoft 365 command to be used by the Model Context Protocol to provide detailed information about the command along with examples, use cases, and option descriptions

tools.name: m365RunCommand
tools.description: Runs a specified CLI for Microsoft 365 command to be used by the Model Context Protocol to execute the command and return the result and reason over the response
